chapter.text: 20|1|Ta ha.
20|2|Ware ga anata ni kuruan o kudashita no wa, anata o nayamasu tamede wanai.
20|3|Omo o osoreru mono e no, kunkai nihokanaranai.
20|4|Daichi to takai sho ten to o tsukuri nasa reru, kare kara kudasa reta keijidearu.
20|5|Jihibukaki okata wa, gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru.
20|6|Ten ni ari-chi ni aru mono, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono, mata, shimetta tsuchi no shita ni aru mono wa, subete kare no monodearu.
20|7|Tatoe anata ga ogoe de hanashite mo (Sekiri naku), kare wa, hime rareta koto mo kakusa rete iru koto mo shitte ora reru.
20|8|Arra, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Mottomo utsukushi gyomei wa kare ni zokusuru.
20|9|Musa no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka.

20|10|Kare ga hi o mite, kazoku ni itta toki no koto o omoi nasai. `Tomare, watashi wa hi o mita. Tabun asoko kara, hi-wa o mochikaeru koto ga dekiyou. Aruiwa ano hi de, michibika reru kamo shirenai.'
20|11|Daga kare ga soko ni kita toki,-goe ga atte yoba reta. `Musa yo,
20|12|hontoni ware wa anata no omodearu. Dakara kutsu o nuge. Ima anata wa, towa no hijiridani ni iru nodearu.
20|13|Ware wa anata o eranda. Dakara (anata ni) keiji suru koto o kike.
20|14|Hontoni ware wa arradearu. Ware no soto ni kami wanai. Dakara ware ni tsukae, ware o kokoro ni daite reihai no tsutome o mamore.
20|15|Tashikani (shumatsu no)-ji wa kuru nodearuga, sore o himete okitai no wa, kakujin ga doryoku shita tokoro ni oji, mukui o uke saseru tamedearu.
20|16|Dakara, kore o shinjinaide jibun no yokubo ni shitagau-sha-tachi kara tozakari, anata o hametsu kara sukue.
20|17|Anata no migite ni aru soreha nanika, musa yo.'
20|18|Kare wa moshiageta. `Kore wa tsuedesu. Watashi wa kore ni motare, mata hitsuji no tame ni kore de (konoha o) uchiotoshi, mata, sono soto no yo ni kyoshimasu.'
20|19|Kare wa ose rareta. `Musa yo, sore o nage yo.'
20|20|Kare ga sore o nageta tokoro, sokuza ni soreha hebi ni natte, hai mawatta.
20|21|Kare wa ose rareta. `Sore o osae yo. Osorete wa naranai. Ware wa sore o gen no yo ni kaesudearou.
20|22|Sorekara anata no te o, wakinoshita ni ire yo. Nani no sawari mo nai no ni, sore wa shiroku narou. Kore wa imahitotsu no shirushi.
20|23|Ware ga saidai no shirushi o, anata ni shimesu tamedearu.
20|24|Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontoni kare wa koman hidodearu.'
20|25|Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, watashi no mune o hirogete kudasai.
20|26|Watashi no shigoto o yoi ni shite kudasai.
20|27|Watashi no shita no motsure o hogushite,
20|28|watashi no kotoba o, kare-ra ni wakara sete kudasai.
20|29|Mata watashi no kazoku no naka kara, enjo-sha o o sazuke kudasai.
20|30|Watashi no kyodai, harun o,
20|31|watashi ni kasei shi,
20|32|watashi no shigoto ni kyoryoku suru yo ni sa sete kudasai.
20|33|Sore wa watashi-tachi ga, anata o oku tatae,
20|34|mata fudan ni anata o nenzuru tamedearimasu.
20|35|Hontoni anata koso, watashi-tachi o mimamori kudasa reru katadearimasu.'
20|36|Kare wa ose rareta. `Musa yo, hontoni anata no negai wa kikitodoke rareta.
20|37|Ware wa, konomae ni mo anata ni megumi o hodokoshita.
20|38|Sonotoki wa, waga ishi o anata no haha ni tsutaeta.

20|39|“(Sonoko o) hako no naka ni irete, kawa ni nage yo. Kawa ga kare o kishi ni uchi age, ware no tekideari, mata kono-ko no teki ga hiroiageyou. ” Soshite anata no ue ni, ware no ai o sosogi kakeru. Sorede ware no me (hogo) no moto de sodate rareru koto ni narou.

20|40|Sonotoki anata no ane ga, makari dete,“watashi ga (Sonoko o) sodateru mono o, o oshie shimashou ka. ” To itta. Koshite ware wa, haha no te ni anata o kaeshi, sorede kano on'na mo manzoku shi, kanashimi mo kieta. Mata anata wa hito o koroshita. Daga ware wa kuno kara anata o sukui, iroiro to anata o kokoromita. Sorekara su-nen no ma, madoyan no min no naka ni taizai shi, sorekara sadame rareta yo ni, anata wa koko ni kita nodearu. Musa yo.
20|41|Ware wa anata o ware (ni hoshi sa seru) tame ni, sodateageta.
20|42|Anata to kyodai wa, ware no shirushi o tazusaete ike. Soshite ware o nenzuru koto o okotatte wa naranai.
20|43|Anata gata ryonin wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontoni kare wa koman hidodearu.
20|44|Daga kare ni monoshizukana toki-kata de katare. Kare wa kunkai o ukeireru ka, matawa ware o osorerudearou.'
20|45|Kare-ra ryonin wa itta. `Omo yo, hontoni kare ga isoide watashi-tachi ni (gai o kuwae) mata hogai no koto o suru no o osoremasu.'
20|46|Kare wa ose rareta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Hontoni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni iru. Kiite ori mite iru nodearu.

20|47|Dakara anata gata ryonin wa okonatte, kare ni itte yaru ga i. “Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Dakara watashi-tachi to issho ni Isuraeru no shison-tachi o shakuho shi, kare-ra o kurushimete wa naranai. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, shirushi o motte anata no nushi kara kita monodearu. Onmichibiki ni shitagau mono wa, heiandearu.
20|48|Hontoni watashi-tachi ni, tashika ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Kyohi suru mono mata somuki saru mono ni wa chobatsu (ga machikamaete iru dakedearu).”'
20|49|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Musa yo, anata gata no omo wa daredearu no ka.'
20|50|Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Watashi-tachi no omo koso wa, ban'yu o sozo shi, hitorihitori ni (sugata ya shishitsu sono soto o) fuyo sa re, sarani michibiki o ataeru katadearu.'
20|51|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Sorenara sugisatta sedai no mono wa do naru no ka.'
20|52|Kare wa itta. `Sore ni kansuru chishiki wa, shosatsu ni shirusa rete omo no omoto ni arimasu. Watashi no omo wa, ayamari o okasu koto mo naku, wasureru koto mo arimasen.

20|53|Kare wa, daichi o anata gata no gasho to sa re, anata gata no tame, soko ni michi o tateyoko ni tsuke, mata ten kara ame o furase rareru. Sore ni yotte, ware wa sorezore no kotonatta shiyu no shokubutsu o seicho sa seru.
20|54|Tabe, mata anata gata no kachiku o hoboku shi nasai. Hontoni sono nakaniha, richi aru mono e no shuju no shirushi ga aru.
20|55|Ware wa, sore (doro) kara anata gata o tsukuri, soreni anata gata o kaera se, mata sore kara imaichido hikidasu nodearu.'
20|56|Ware wa kare (firuaun) ni, subete no waga shirushi o shimeshita nodaga, kare wa kyogidearu to shite kyohi shita.
20|57|Kare wa itta. `Musa yo, anata gata wa majutsu de, kono kuni kara watashi-tachi o oidasu tame ni kita no ka.

20|58|Sorenara, watashi-tachi mo sono yona majutsu o anata ni mochidasou. Sa, watashi-tachi to anata no ma de yakusoku shite kokai no basho o sadame, watashi-tachi mo anata mo sore o tagaenai yo ni shiyou.'
20|59|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Anata to no kaigo no yakusoku wa,-sai no hidearu. Hitobito o hirumae ni o atsume kudasai.'
20|60|Sokode firuaun wa hikitori, yagate keikaku o nette (kaette) kita.

20|61|Musa wa kare-ra ni itta. `Anata gata wa wazawai ni audarou. Kare ga anata gata o shobatsu shite horobosa reru koto no nai yo, arra ni taishi netsuzo shi, uso o itte wa naranai. (Uso o) netsuzo suru mono wa kanarazu shippai suru.'
20|62|Sokode kare-ra wa otagai ni saku o nette ronji attaga, mochiron sono sodan wa himitsu ni shita.
20|63|Kare-ra wa itta. `Tashikani ryonin wa majutsu-shidearu. Kare-ra wa ano majutsu de anata gata o kokudo kara oidashi, anata gata no sugureta narawashi o konzetsu shiyou to nozonde iru.
20|64|Sorede kakuji no keikaku o neri, sorekara retsu o nashite takare. Kyo shori o eru mono wa, kanarazu sakaeru nodearu.'
20|65|Kare-ra wa itta. `Musa yo, anata ga nageru ka, soretomo watashi-tachi ga saki ni nageyou ka.'
20|66|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Iya, anata gataga sakini nage nasai.' Suru to miruga i. Kare ni wa nawa to tsue ga, majutsu de (ikite) hashiru ka no yo ni mieta.
20|67|Sore de musa wa, sukoshi kokoro ni osore o kanjita.
20|68|Ware wa itta. `Osoreru ni wa oyobanai. Hontoni anata ga jozudearu.
20|69|Anata no migite ni aru mono o nage nasai. Kare-ra ga tsukutta mono o nomikome. Majutsu-shi no gomakashi nisuginai. Majutsu-shi wa doko kara kite mo,(nanigoto mo) seiko shinai.'
20|70|Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, fuku shite sajida shi,`watashi-tachi wa, musa to harun no omo o shinko shimasu.' To itta.

20|71|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi ga yurusanai naka ni, kare o shinjiru no ka. Hontoni kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta anata gata no tomokudearou. Anata gata no ryote to ryoashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shite, natsumeyashi no kan ni haritsuke ni surudearou. Anata gata wa dochira no chobatsu ga yori genjude, eizoku suru ka kanarazu wakarudearou.'

20|72|Kare-ra (majutsu-shi) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, watashi-tachi ni shimesa reta meihakuna shirushi, mata watashi-tachi o sozo nasa reta kare ijo ni, anata o omonjiru koto wa fukanodesu. Sorede anata no kettei sa reru koto o jisshi shite kudasai. Daga anata wa, gense no seikatsu ni oite dake, hanketsu nasaru ni sugimasen.

20|73|Hontoni watashi-tachi ga omo o shinko suru no wa, watashi-tachi no go Chino o yurushi o koi, mata anata ga murijideshita majutsu ni taishite, o yurushi o kou tamedearimasu. Arra wa shizen ni shite towa ni iki rareru kata de ara remasu.'
20|74|Tsumibito to shite omo no omoto ni kuru mono ni wa, hontoni jigoku ga aru. Sono Chu de kare wa shi mo naku nama mo nai.
20|75|Daga, oku no zenko o shite, shinja to shite kare no moto ni kita mono ni wa takai ikai o ataeru.
20|76|Kare (shinja) wa eien ni kawa ga shita o nagareru adon (eden) no rakuen ni sumu nodearu. Kore wa, jibun o junketsu ni mamotta mono e no hoshodearu.

20|77|Ware wa musa ni keiji shita. `Ware no shimo be-tachi to tomoni yoru ni tabidatte, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, umi no naka ni kawaita michi o (anata no tsue de) uchi ake. (Firuaun no gunzei ni) oitsuka reru koto o shinpai suru na. Mata (umi o) kowagaru koto wanai.'
20|78|Hatashite firuaun wa, gunzei o hikiite kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) o ottaga, kaisui ga kare-ra o kanzen ni suichu ni shizume otte shimatta.
20|79|(Ko no yo ni) firuaun wa sono min o mayowa se, tadashiku michibikanakatta nodearu.
20|80|Isuraeru no shison yo, ware wa anata gata o teki kara sukui, mata (Shinai) yama no migigawa de anata gata to yakusoku o musubi, Man'na to uzura o anata gata ni kudashita.

20|81|(Soshite ware wa itta. ) `Ware ga anata gata ni sazuketa yoi mono o tabe nasai. Saritote ware no ikari ga anata gata ni kudaranai yo,-ho o koete wa naranai. Dare demo ware no ikari ni fureru mono wa, kanarazu horobiru.
20|82|Daga kaigo shite shinko shi, zenko ni isoshimi, sonogo (tadashiku) michibika reru mono ni wa, ware wa tabitabi kan'yo o shimesu.'
20|83|`Musa yo, naze anata wa, jibun no min yori hanare, sakinjite isogu no ka.'
20|84|Kare wa moshiageta. `Kare-ra wa, watashi no ashiato o otte mairimasu. Omo yo, watashi wa anata ga o yorokobi ni naru yo isoida nodesu.'
20|85|Kare wa ose rareta. `Hontoni ware wa anata no satta nochi anata no min o kokoromitaga, samiri ga kare-ra o mayowa seta.'

20|86|Sokode musa wa, ikari kanashinde min no moto ni kaeri, itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, anata gata no omo wa, yoi yakusoku o anata gata ni musuba renakatta nodesu ka. Anata gata ni wa amarini nagai yakusoku no yo ni omowa reta nodesu ka. Soretomo omo kara no o ikari ga anata gata ni kudaru koto o nozonda nodesu ka. Dakara watashi to no yakusoku o chigaeta nodesu ka.'

20|87|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa jibun ni tashikana konkyo ga atte, anata to no yakusoku o yabutta node wa nai nodesu. Watashi-tachi wa Ejiputo hito no, soshoku-hin no omoni o owasa retanode, sore o (hi no naka ni) nageireta nodesu. Samiri mo nagekonda yo nidesu.'
20|88|Sokode kare (samiri) wa, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, hoeru koushi no guzo o tsukutta. Soshite itta. `Kore wa anata gata no kami de, mata musa no kamidesu, kare wa wasureta nodesu.'
20|89|Soreha, hitokoto mo kare-ra ni kotaezu, mata kare-ra ni gai mo naku eki mo nai koto ga wakaranai nodearou ka.

20|90|Harun wa (kono koto no) mae ni, jubun ni kare-ra ni itta. `Hitobito yo. Anata gata wa kore ni yotte kokoromi rareru nodesu. Omo wa, hontoni jihibukai katadesu. Dakara watashi ni shitagai, watashi no meirei ni fukuju shi nasai.'
20|91|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, musa ga kaette kuru made,(koushi) o ogami tsudzukerudeshou.'
20|92|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Harun yo, kare-ra ga mayou no o mita toki, nani ga anata (no gimu no riko) o samatageta nodesu ka.
20|93|Watashi ni shitagawanai nodesu ka. Watashi no meirei ni somuku nodesu ka.'

20|94|Kare (harun) wa itta. `Watashi no haha no ko yo, watashi no hige ya atama (no kami) o tsukamu no o tomete kudasai. Hontoni watashi wa anata ga,“Isuraeru no shison no ma o bunretsu sa semashita. Mata jibun no kotoba o mamorimasendeshita. ” To iu no o osoreta nodesu.'
20|95|Kare (musa) wa itta. `De wa samiri yo, anata no (okonatta koto no) mokuteki wa nandesuka.'

20|96|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, kare-ra no minakatta mono o mita nodesu. Sorede shito no ashiato kara hitonigiri no (tsuchi) o totte, sore o (koushi no zo) ni nagetsuketa nodesu. Watashi no kokoro ga, so watashi ni shisa shita nodesu.'

20|97|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Dete iki nasai. Ikite iru kagiri wa,“-fuka sawa” to iu koto ni narou. Kesshite yaburenai yakusoku (shobatsu) ga anata ni wa aru. Anata ga nomerikonde suhai shite ita kamigami o mi nasai. Watashi-tachi wa kon'na mono wa yaite umi no naka ni makichirasudeshou.
20|98|(Hitobito yo) hontoni anata gata no kami wa arra dakedesu. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodesu. Kare wa, subete no mono o sono o chishiki ni hoyo nasa remasu.'
20|99|Kono yo ni ware wa, izen ni okotta shosoku o anata ni katari, waga moto kara anata ni kunkai o kudashita.
20|100|Dare demo sore ni somuku mono wa, fukkatsu no hi ni kanarazu omoni o oudearou.
20|101|Kare-ra wa itsu made mo kono jotai no mamadearu. Fukkatsu no hi no omoni koso, kare-ra ni tori wazawaidearu.
20|102|Rappa ga fuka reru hi, kono Ni~Tsu ware wa kumotta me no tsumibukaimono o shoshu suru.
20|103|Kare-ra wa sasayaki atte,`anata gata wa 10 (Ni~Tsu) mo taizai shinakattadearou.' To iu.
20|104|Ware wa kare-ra no iou to suru koto o yoku shitte iru. Sonotoki mo seko ni taketa mono ga,`watashi-tachi no taizai wa 1-nichi ni mo naranai.' To iudearou.
20|105|Kare-ra wa yama ni tsuite, anata ni toudearou. Sokode itte yaru ga i. `Watashi no omo wa, sore o konagona ni shite maki chirasa reru.
20|106|Kare wa, sore o tairana hirachi ni nasa re,
20|107|soko ni wa, magari mo ototsu mo minaideshou.'
20|108|Sonohi kare-ra wa yobi-te ni shitagai hagureru wake ni wa ikanai. Jihibukai okata no gozende wa,-goe wa hikuku nari, shinobiashi no oto no soto wa kikanaidearou.
20|109|Sonohi, jihibukai okata ni o yurushi o ete iru mono igai no torinashi wa muekidearou. Sono-sha no kotoba wa, kare ni ukeire rareru.
20|110|Kare wa, kare-ra no mae ni aru koto, ushiro ni aru koto o shitte ora reru. Daga kare-ra (ningen) no chishikide wa, sore o hakari shiru koto wa dekinai.
20|111|Kare-ra no kao wa, eisei shi jison suru okata no gozen de utsumuite irudearou. Soshite zaigo o ou mono ni, ukabu se wanai.
20|112|Daga zenko ni isoshimi, shinko shita mono wa, nani no shinpai mo naku,(-nushi kara no hosho o) herasa reru koto mo nai nodearu.
20|113|Kono yo ni, ware wa kono keiji o Arabia-go no kurua ― n to shite kudashi, sono Chu de iroiro to keikoku o tsutaeta. Tabun kare-ra wa omo o osore, matawa kyokun o etoku shiyou.

20|114|Arra wa, ito takaku ora reru shin no ojadearu. Anata (yogen-sha muhanmado) ni taisuru keiji ga kanryo shinai mae ni, kuruan o isoide wa naranai. Mushiro (inotte) ii nasai. `Omo yo, watashi no chishiki o fukamete kudasai.'
20|115|Ware wa, izen ni adamu ni kaku to yakusoku shita. Daga kare wa (sono riko o) wasureta. Ware wa, kare ga sore ni kengodearu to wa mitomenai.
20|116|Ware ga tenshi-tachi ni taishi,`adamu ni sajida shi nasai.' To itta toki o omoi nasai. Iburisu no soto kare-ra wa sajida shita. Daga kare wa kyohi shita.
20|117|Sorede ware wa itta. `Adamu yo, hontoni kono-sha wa, anata to anata no tsuma no tekidearu. Sorede anata gata ryonin wa kono rakuen kara oidasa rete, fuko ni ochi iranai yo ki o tsuke nasai.
20|118|Kokode wa, anata gata no tame ni (jubun no onmegumi ga atte) ue mo naku, hadaka ni naru koto mo nai.
20|119|Mata kawaki o oboeru koto mo naku, taiyo no atsusa ni mo sarasa renai.'
20|120|Shikashi akuma wa kare ni sasayaite itta. `Adamu yo. Watashi wa anata ni eisei no ki to, otoroeru koto no nai oken o oshiete agemashou.'
20|121|Ryonin ga sore o taberu to, haji kashi tokoro ga arawa ni natta. Sore de kare-ra wa sono en no konoha de soko o oi hajimeta. Koshite adamu wa omoni somuki, go chi o okashita.
20|122|Sonogo,-nushi wa kare o erabi, kaigo o yurusa re onmichibiki ni nara reta.

20|123|Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata gata ryonin wa issho ni koko kara sagare. Anata-tachi wa tagaini teki de aru. Moshi anata gata ni ware kara michibiki ga kudareba, daredemo waga michibiki ni shitagau mono wa mayou koto naku, mata fuko ni ochiranaidearou.
20|124|Daga dare demo, waga kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha wa, seikatsu ga kyukutsu ni nari, mata shinpan no hi ni wa momoku de yomigaera sa rerudearou.'
20|125|Kare wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi wa (izen) hare-gen-shadeatta no ni, naze watashi o momoku to shite yomigaera seta nodesu ka.'
20|126|Kare wa ose rareru. `Ware no shirushi ga anata ni kudatta toki, anata wa sore o mushi shitade wanai ka. Kyo anata wa sore to doyo mushi sa reru nodearu.'
20|127|Ware wa kono yo ni shite, somuita mono to omo no shirushi o shinjinakatta mono ni mukuiru. Daga raise ni okeru chobatsu wa, sarani kibishiku mata eizoku suru.

20|128|Kare-ra ni wa onmichibiki wa nakatta no ka. Kare-ra yori izen ni mo ware wa don'nani oku no sedai o horoboshita koto ka. Kare-ra (kojin) no sunde ita tokoro o (ima) kare-ra wa aruite iru. Hontoni kono nakaniha richi ni tomu mono e no shirushi ga aru.
20|129|Moshi,-nushi kara o kotoba ga kudasa rete inakattanaraba,(chobatsu wa) yoke rarenai nodearu. Daga, sadame rareta (yuyo no) kigen ga aru.

20|130|Dakara kare-ra no iu koto o shinobi, taiyo ga agaru mae, mata sore ga shizumu mae ni, anata no omo no eiko o tatae nasai. Nao yoru no ichiji mo, mata hiru no ryotan ni mo tatae nasai. Kanarazu anata gata wa mitasarerudearou.

20|131|Mata ware ga, kare-ra no aru burui no mono ni ataeta konoyo no seikatsu no eiga ni, anata no me o mihatte wa naranai. Ware wa, sore ni yotte kare-ra o kokoromita. Anata no omo no tamamono koso shijo de mata eizoku suru.

20|132|Mata anata no kazoku ni reihai o meiji, soshite (anata mo), sore o tae nasai. Ware wa anata ni onmegumi o motomenai. Anata gata ni megumi o ataeru no wa waredearu. Zenka wa omo o osoreru mono no ue ni aru.
20|133|Mata kare-ra wa,`nazekare wa, watashi-tachi ni omo kara hitotsu no shirushi o mo motarasanai nodesu ka.' To iu. Izen no sho Keisuke ni aru meisho ga, kare-ra ni kudatte irude wanai ka.

20|134|Ware ga moshi kore izen ni kare-ra o shobatsu shite, horoboshite itanaraba, kare-ra wa kanarazu,`omo yo, naze anata wa, watashi-tachi ni shito o tsukawasa renakatta nodesu ka. So sureba watashi-tachi wa, iyashima re kutsujoku o komuru mae ni, anata no shirushi ni shitagattadeshou ni.' To ittadearou.
20|135|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Kakujin wa matte iru. Dakara anata gata mo mate. Anata gata wa yagate, heitan'na michi o ayumu mono wa dare ka, mata michibika reta mono wa dare ka o shirudearou.'
